Prefer work in the right mental state

Which helps answer Prefer work on the right time of day.

On the one hand, after a long day, I feel much more inclined to read someone else's ideas than to create my own. And after having read a lot, I feel more fuzzy in my head.

On the other hand, in the spirit of §ACT, your feelings are often not great indicators of what the right thing to do is. And Mieke tends to do her work at whichever time of day is required. Routines of creatives vary widely, albeit most of them did have most of their creative work before admin/leisure.
